advancements.easy_mob_farm.crafting.root: Build your mob farm to easily farm the resources you need.
advancements.easy_mob_farm.crafting.craf: To make sure the animals feels comfortable we need to gather some material from the plains.
Create s sweat home for plains animals.
For catching basic animals we need a small collar.
How to catch animal?
For farming desert creatues you need a desert farm.
Whats is a Husk?
The fishing bowl allows you to capture smaller fish.
Let's start with a small fish?
With the small fishing net you can catch nornal ocean creatues like squids.
Do you like tentacles?
First build a iron mob farm template from a iron frame with glass.
Lets build our first easy mob farm.
To make sure the monsters feels comfortable we need to gatehr some material from the cave.
Create a dark home for cave monsters.
For farming fish and other ocean creatues you need a ocean farm.
Want to farm some fish?
Want to farm a witch?
For farming a witch and other swamp creatues you need a swamp farm.
For catching basic monsters we need a small urn.
How to catch monsters?
For catching a witch we need a witch bottle and some luck.
How to catch a witch?
text.easy_mob_farm.capture: ► Target mob and right click to capture
text.easy_mob_farm.release: ► Right click on empty place to release %1$s
text.easy_mob_farm.supported_mobs: The mob farm is able to process the following type of mobs:
text.easy_mob_farm.supported_creative: The mob farm is able to process all types of mobs

text.easy_mob_farm.mob_farm_template: This mob farm template is used to build the different kind of mob farms. It will not work on his own.
message.easy_mob_farm.warning_full: Your Easy Mob Farm (%1$s) at %2$s is full and unable to store: %3$s!
